content:
Hello!

I found this link at Connectathon 27 page https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-05+TestScript+and+FHIR+Testing#id-202105TestScriptandFHIRTesting-Zulipstream

It seems that it is the only thread on zulip for TestScript. Is it the right place to discuss http://hl7.org/fhir/testscript.html resource?
You're in the right place! Feel free to ask any question / start any discussion around TestScript here
OK cool. I have a lot of questions and topics to discuss. I will post them soon.

Hello!

I created a document that describes issues I faced during experimenting on python based TestScript evaluator https://github.com/beda-software/testscript-eval-py

Feel free to add comments and notes. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pxbwULvMkoVdDS1j9chwl2rVaY-IH0bRW2f_AHyW4zs/edit

Hi! It was nice talking with all of you!
Did somebody have a chance to review my document?
I am going to move the discussion forward, but let's start with some basic things I have already described.
@Richard Ettema @ryan moehrke

@Ilya Beda I added my initial thoughts to your document (prefixed [RM]) I hope I answered some of your questions well enough, but like I mentioned in our call last week I think some of your concerns we need to talk through with the full group on our call in order to come to a good consensus.
